original_text: They gave it to the carpenters and the builders to buy quarried stone, and timber for binders and beams for the buildings that the kings of Judah had let go to ruin.
korean_text: 곧 목수들과 건축하는 자들에게 주어 다듬은 돌과 연접하는 나무를 사며 유다 왕들이 헐어버린 성전들을 위하여 들보를 만들게 하매

sentences.original_text: They gave it to the carpenters and the builders
and timber for binders and beams
that the kings of Judah had let go to ruin
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 왕들이 폐허가 되도록 내버려 둔
